response.text: Say, I couldn't help but notice that you're carrying some valuable metals with you. Have you ever thought about casting them into coins?
I, uh, I haven't really thought about it. I just use the coins I find or trade for.
Well, if you're willing to part with some of those metals, I know a skilled caster who can turn them into coins. It's a great way to increase their value and make them more easily tradeable.
I see. That sounds interesting. Do you think the caster would be willing to take a look at my metals?
Of course! I'll be happy to introduce you. Just follow me and I'll take you to him.
